pages.title: Desert Monitor
pages.text: The desert monitor ($(o)Varanus griseus$()) is a species of monitor lizard of the order Squamata found living throughout North Africa and Central and South Asia.$(br2)The desert monitor is carnivorous, feeding on a wide range of vertebrates and invertebrates.

pages.title: Desert Monitor
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)3 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:food_turtle_raw$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: None Days
